assessments.status_rationale: This prediction depends on the S&P 500 close on 2025-12-31 versus 2025-12-22; today’s news does not provide the 12/31 closing level.
No item in today’s news indicates a PBoC 1-year LPR cut of at least 10 bps versus the 2025-12-22 level; the deadline is 2026-03-31.

Today’s bullets include a mistrial in a New York case involving alleged work for China, but nothing about a DOJ-announced criminal case specifically involving PRC-directed transnational repression activity on U.S. soil; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No bullet describes Canada announcing new border-enforcement measures targeting illegal firearm smuggling from the U.S. with C$100M+ funding or a new bill; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No bullet indicates the European Commission has published a COM legislative proposal altering/delaying the EU 2035 light-duty vehicle zero-CO2/ICE phaseout framework; deadline is 2026-06-30.
No bullet reports a California regulator opening a formal proceeding explicitly referencing the San Francisco robotaxi blackout-related service disruption; deadline is 2026-03-31.
This is a 2026 H1 layoff-tracker metric; today’s news does not provide any relevant 2026 H1 tracker totals.
No bullet indicates a CO2-based energy storage provider has announced commercial operation of a ≥10 MWh grid-connected project; deadline is 2026-12-31.
No bullet mentions NOAA/USGS/FEMA announcing ≥$50M in new federal funding awards specifically for tsunami risk mitigation/evacuation infrastructure in Alaska; deadline is 2026-09-30.

Today’s news explicitly reports that the Trump administration is conducting oil tanker seizures targeting Venezuela (NYT and CNBC items), which constitutes a public report of seizure/detention/forced diversion of at least one tanker carrying Venezuelan-origin crude/products, and this occurs before the 2026-03-31 deadline.
